text: Spirit AeroSystems, Inc. ("Spirit") is the world's biggest first-tier aerostructures manufacturer. They are in Wichita, Kansas. Spirit's main competition comes from Triumph Aerostructures - Vought Aircraft Division, UTC Aerospace Systems, Leonardo, and Kawasaki Heavy Industries. ==References== ==Other websites== * * "Spirit gets first shot at non-Boeing job", Wichita Business Journal, October 16, 2005 * "Spirit plans mega project with $1 billion investment and 1,000 more jobs in Wichita", The Wichita Eagle, December 6, 2017 Category:Companies based in Kansas Category:2005 establishments in the United States Category:Aerospace engineering Category:21st-century establishments in Kansas
title: Spirit AeroSystems
